amendment.description: Amendment sought to end production of the Trident II (D-5) submarine-launched ballistic missile.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 106-621 to conclude further production of the Trident II (D-5) submarine-launched ballistic missile.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Luther amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 112 - 313 (Roll no. 196).
